Derek Steinmoeller, B.Math, M.Math, Ph.D.

Derek is a Ph.D. graduate from the Applied Math Department of the University of Waterloo. His Ph.D. advisors were Marek Stastna and Kevin Lamb. He is an alumnus of the Environmental and Geophysical Fluid Dynamics Group.

Derek is a currently a full-time software developer. He enjoys developing in a variety of languagues including C/C++, C#, Python, Go, and JavaScript (mostly Node.js).
